name: ai-codereviewer
description: A simple React app that lets users write JavaScript code, get an AI-generated code review, and view the review in a markdown format. The code editor highlights syntax using **Prism.js**, and reviews are rendered using **React Markdown** with **highlighting** via **rehype-highlight**.

scripts.build: npm install --prefix ai-backend && npm install --prefix ai-frontend && npm run build --prefix ai-frontend
